name: Radiate B2B
description:
Our account based marketing (ABM) platform allows companies to proactively reach and influence the people they want to reach at companies they want to win with personalised advertising that only they can see. 

Proven to driver larger contracts faster, we are also able to identify companies earlier in the buying phase allowing our clients to build stronger relationships by starting conversations with prospects earlier.

The account based marketing approach is revolutionising the way marketers do B2B marketing in a way that sees sales and marketing teams working hand in hand to win more clients faster.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Riaz Kanani
team.bioHtml: Founder and CEO @Radiate B2B. Previous successful exit to Silverpop (now IBM). #adtech #martech #datascience focus in operations and marketing.

jobs.title: Business Development Representative
jobs.description:
We’re looking for an ambitious business development rep to join our founding team. 

About Us
We are building a new way to deliver B2B marketing using a strategy called account based marketing (ABM). It creates a much better experience for the buyer. Our platform enables our clients to build awareness within their target prospects and prioritise the activities of their sales teams. This approach is going to transform the way marketers build their B2B marketing plans in the future, not just here in the UK but globally.

We are already live in market and have paying customers. Our message is already resonating with the market and we got shortlisted for ABM vendor of the year and emerging vendor of the year by B2B Marketing magazine. 

Our founder also has prior success at building and scaling startups, successfully exiting his company to Silverpop, one of the world's leading marketing platforms, which exited to IBM. Silverpop led the way in defining how B2B marketing was executed over a decade ago. Now it is time to reinvent it again!

The role
You will be a graduate or have up to 2 years of experience and a desire to join a rapidly growing startup. This role is all about creating pipeline for the company. You will:

* Build and iterate on our outbound lead acquisition activities.
* Generate interest and build a pipeline using phone, email, chat, social media and events.
* Qualify leads and turn them into active opportunities.
* Record your activity in our CRM.

You’re going to succeed if you are:

* An ambitious, highly curious and love to sell.
* Be a self starter that is keen to push themselves to get success.
* Outgoing and enjoy creating relationships.
* Be able to work independently and still be a part of a team.
* Have a high attention to detail and be exceptional at communicating – both written and verbally.

Have no doubt, this is an exciting time to join as there is plenty of opportunity for growth as our team expands. Working for a startup that is completely disrupting the marketing world should clearly also appeal.
